name: Oddsters: Idle Saga
description:
Become a mastermind behind the self-manageable microcosm of a sorcerous living tree & its odd inhabitants!
Craft your own odd but cute creatures – Oddsters, inhabit them in a friendly atmosphere, send them to explore the fantastic world around & see what they will bring you back!
Craft, explore & observe!

Features:
• Stress-free idle adventures, where simply observe the life in its beauty.
• Wide variety of a bit odd but super cute creatures - oddsters!
• House all your tiny friends in a sorcery atmosphere of a living tree.
• Send your oddsters on a quest of exploring fantastic world around!
• Make decisions how to bear with encounters on your monsters’ way.
• Gather unexpected riches from all the travels.
• Exercise your imagination by crafting new oddsters from the loot you will collect.
… and all that odd jazz!

P.S. Keep an eye on the lands while exploring, there might be some extras!
